articles.author: Andy Gregory
articles.title: Peru earthquake: Large 7.5 magnitude tremors hit South American country, seismologists confirm - The Independent
articles.description: No tsunami warning issued after 110km-deep tremor felt in Ecaudor and Colombia
articles.content:
A major earthquake with a magnitude of 7.5 has struck northern Peru, with some damage to homes and several minor injuries reported.
The tremor occurred in a very sparsely populated region of the Ama… [+12310 chars]

articles.title: Pfizer and Moderna set to adapt to Omicron COVID variant - New York Post
articles.description: The manufacturers of America’s most used COVID-19 vaccines insist they have plans in place to quickly adapt to potential challenges presented by the new omicron variant.
articles.content:

articles.title: RIP Stephen Sondheim - Dark Horizons
articles.description: Famed American musical composer, lyricist and legend Stephen Sondheim has died at the age of 91 at his home in Connecticut. Sondheim created such iconic musicals as “Sweeney Todd,” “Company,” “Into the Woods,” “Sunday in the Park with George,” “Assassins,” “F…
